casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Randy Lee SELLARS. No. 547P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 23, 2005. Jarvis John Edgerton, IV, for Randy Lee Sellars. Robert F. Johnson, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of September 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of September 2005."
